Package climatemonitoring.core.gui

Class InputTextMultiline

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.gui.Widget
climatemonitoring.core.gui.InputText
climatemonitoring.core.gui.InputTextMultiline
public class InputTextMultiline extends InputText
Same as InputText, but on multiple lines
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

  • Constructor Details

    • InputTextMultiline

      public InputTextMultiline(String label, String str, String error_msg, int max_chars)
      Initialize InputText fields
      Parameters:
      label - The input text box label
      str - The string that will be rendered inside the box for the first time
      error_msg - The error message that will be shown when the InputText.showErrorMsg(boolean) method will enable the error message rendering
      max_chars - The maximum number of characters that can be typed in the input text box

    • InputTextMultiline

      Parameters:

      str - The string that will be rendered inside the box for the first time
      error_msg - The error message that will be shown when the InputText.showErrorMsg(boolean) method will enable the error message rendering

  • Method Details

    • render

      public boolean render()
      Renders to screen the input text box
      Overrides:
      render in class InputText
      Returns:
      True when the user is typing by default, but if the InputText.setEnterReturnsTrue(boolean) method set the flag to true, then the function will return true only if the user presses ctrl + enter while the input text has focus
